channel.title: CVE Feed for Exclusive Addons -- Exclusive Addons Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-32557|2024-04-16T06:39:26.572Z -- Exclusive Addons -- Exclusive Addons Elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Exclusive Addons Exclusive Addons Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Exclusive Addons Elementor: from n/a through 2.6.9.2.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Exclusive Addons Exclusive Addons Elementor.This issue affects Exclusive Addons Elementor: from n/a through 2.6.9.1.
